list.title: TorController#event:close
list.description: Fires when the underlying socket closes

list.title: TorController#event:error
list.description: Fired when the underlying socket encounters an error

list.title: TorController#event:ready
list.description: Fires when the controller is authenticated and ready to send commands

list.title: module:granax
list.description: Embeddable Tor and Control Protocol.

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~AddOnionReply}

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~ProtocolInfoReply}

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~ControlCommand}

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~ControlReply}

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~GetConfReply}

list.description: {@link module:granax/control~GetInfoReply}

list.description: {@link module:granax/network~HiddenServer}

list.title: module:granax.HiddenSocket
list.description: {@link module:granax/network~HiddenSocket}

list.title: module:granax.ProtocolInfoReply
list.description: {@link module:granax/control~ProtocolInfoReply}

list.title: module:granax.TorConfig
list.description: {@link module:granax/config~TorConfig}

list.title: module:granax.TorContext
list.description: {@link module:granax/context~TorContext}

list.title: module:granax.TorControl

list.title: module:granax.TorHttpAgent
list.description: {@link module:granax/network~TorHttpAgent}

list.title: module:granax/context~TorContext.getExecPath
list.description: Returns the local path to the tor bundle

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#addEventListeners
list.description: Instructs Tor to send asynchronous events for the given types - these events will be emitted from the controller. Calling this method resets previously set event listeners

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#attachStream
list.description: Attaches the specified stream to the given circuit

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#authenticate
list.description: Authenticates with the control port given the supplied param

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#cleanCircuits
list.description: Clears DNS cache and establishes new clean circuits

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#clearDnsCache
list.description: Forget client side hostname->ip cache

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#closeCicuit
list.description: Closes the given circuit

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#closeStream
list.description: Closes the exit for the given stream

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#createAddressMapping
list.description: Instruct Tor to route requests to the target to the replacement

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#createCircuit
list.description: Creates a new circuit, returning the newly created circuit ID

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#createHiddenService
list.description: Establishes a hidden service on the given target

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#destroyHiddenService
list.description: Takes down a running hidden service owned by this controller

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#dropGuards
list.description: Tells the server to drop all guard nodes. Do not invoke this command lightly; it can increase vulnerability to tracking attacks over time.

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#dumpHeartbeat
list.description: Dumps a heartbeat message to the logs

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#dumpStats
list.description: Dump stats to tor log file

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#enableDebug
list.description: Set open logs to debug level

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#extendCircuit
list.description: Extends the existing circuit

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#fetchHiddenServiceDescriptor
list.description: Fetches descriptors for the given hidden service

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#getAuthChallenge
list.description: Requests an authentication challenge from tor

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#getConfig
list.description: Return the values for the given configuration key

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#getInfo
list.description: Get information from Tor not stored in configuration

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#getProtocolInfo
list.description: Ask tor for general information

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#halt
list.description: Shutdown tor immediately

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#loadConfig
list.description: Instruct Tor to load the configuration file from the given text

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#postDescriptor
list.description: Inform the server about a new descriptor

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#postHiddenServiceDescriptor
list.description: Launch a hidden service descriptor upload

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#quit
list.description: Tells Tor to hang up on the controller

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#redirectStream
list.description: Change the exit address on a given stream

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#reloadConfig
list.description: Reloads the config values set

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#removeEventListeners
list.description: Instructs Tor to stop listening for events

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#resetConfig
list.description: Change the value for a configuration variable to it's default

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#resolve
list.description: Launch remote hostname lookup - answer returnd as async ADDRMAP event

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#saveConfig
list.description: Tell Tor to write out it's config value to it's torrc

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#setCircuitPurpose
list.description: Sets the purpose of the given circuit

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#setConfig
list.description: Change the value for a configuration variable

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#shutdown
list.description: Controlled shutdown signal

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#signal
list.description: Sends a signal to the control port

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl#takeOwnership
list.description: Take ownership of the tor process - will close tor when the connection closes

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl.createChallengeResponse
list.description: Creates the challenge response from a SAFECOOKIE challenge

list.title: module:granax/control~TorControl.createReplySplitter
list.description: Creates a message splitter from incoming socket data

list.title: module:granax~replies
list.description: {@link module:granax/control~ControlReply}
